backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with authorization/storage mixins and a large set of shared types for profiles, budgets, households, reminders, wellbeing, fitness, meals, shopping lists, achievements, and chat.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables for light and dark modes using an OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element, metadata, favicon, and script loading for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication flow, profile loading, onboarding, and rendering the app layout.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Ach: UI for the achievements module showing placeholder achievements with a notice that backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen using Internet Identity with branded hero section, login card, and adult-age notice.
frontend/src/components/budget/BudgetEnt: Manages adding, deleting, and persisting income/expense entries in localStorage and reports totals upward.
frontend/src/components/budget/PersonalB: Displays budget summary, progress, and a form to update budget values while integrating BudgetEntriesEditor.
frontend/src/components/community/chat/G: Renders global chat with message fetch/send, error handling, scrolling, and message input.
frontend/src/components/community/chat/H: Displays household chat with special handling for users not in a household and supports sending messages.
frontend/src/components/community/chat/M: Shows a single chat message with avatar, timestamp, and admin/flagging controls.
frontend/src/components/community/chat/P: Displays private conversations, loads messages, supports sending and pausing chats, and handles backend unavailability.
frontend/src/components/community/chat/S: Adminâ€‘only group chat panel that loads staff messages, sends new ones, and shows an error if backend is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/community/Commun: Provides tabbed navigation for global, private, household, and admin-only staff chats.
frontend/src/components/household/Househ: Household dashboard showing invites, an invite panel, and placeholder sections pending backend integration.
Form for sending household invitations using a mutation hook with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/household/Pendin: Lists incoming household invites with accept and decline actions using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout managing navigation, view switching, theming, and logout across many feature modules.
frontend/src/components/meal-planning/Me: UI for creating and viewing meal plans with placeholder messaging due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/components/memberships/Memb: Membership tracking module with disclaimer and placeholders until backend storage and analysis exist.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarUp: Handles image file validation and uploads a profile picture with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/Onboardi: Collects user info for initial profile creation and validates age before submitting.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays and updates user profile details, including avatar upload and private information.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar image or fallback initials based on provided data.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Renewa: UI for managing renewal reminders with placeholder alerts for missing backend support.
frontend/src/components/savings-coach/Sa: Provides savings guidance UI and notes pending backend functionality.
frontend/src/components/shopping/Shoppin: UI for creating and viewing shopping lists with backend not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages theme state and toggling between light and dark modes using context.
frontend/src/components/wellbeing/Wellbe: UI for wellbeing tracking with tabs for BMI, goals, and activities; backend not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides React Query hooks for global and private chat operations, including fetching messages, sending messages, and managing conversation status with polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login state, identity loading, and providing a provider wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Defines moderation hooks for flagging, fetching, deleting, and resolving messages, with query invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Contains hooks for retrieving and updating user profiles, roles, and profile pictures with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers hooks for budgets, household invites, and public profiles, including fetch and mutation helpers with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines a warm color theme with custom variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
Displays a staff-only table of all users with avatars, private details, age calculation, and adult status badges.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffModeration: Provides admin-only tools to review, resolve, and delete flagged messages with tabbed views and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utility functions for calculating age, checking adulthood, and validating date-of-birth values.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Maps backend error messages to cleaner, user-friendly error text.
frontend/src/utils/storageKeys.ts: Manages localStorage keys for user budget data and provides a helper to clear stored entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, active features, known issues, and incremental development goals for backend/UI integration and messaging features.
